desc: The gold standard of high-stretch sheets offering luxurious comfort without any surface tension. Wrap-around tailored fit in 28 colors. 96% cotton/4% elastane, breathable & temperature regulating, best for memory-foam, adjustable beds & pillow-tops, from 8 to 16" deep. All standard sizes.

layout.text: The Gold Standard Of Fitted Jersey Stretch Sheets
The perfect sheet for your perfect mattress. Made in Germany.
